snippet.title: 1943 - Berlin Blitz  | Teaser Trailer - VR Experience
snippet.description:
1943: Berlin Blitz  uses VR to breathe new life into the BBC Archive, using an extraordinary piece of war time journalism to transport you to Berlin at the height of the Second World War. 

Produced for the BBC, BBC Northern Ireland & BBC Rewind by Immersive VR Education.

This experience will be released later this year on Oculus Rift, HTC Vive, Vive Pro, Windows MR, Oculus Go, Daydream and Samsung Gear VR
